original_title: Nada Levarei Quando Morrer, Aqueles Que Mim Deve Cobrarei no Inferno
overview: An exercise in gentle voyeurism revealing glimpses of the secret side of Salvador, the capital city of the Brazilian state of Bahia, filming a derelict prostitution zone.
title: Nothing with Me When I Die, Those Who Owe Me I'll Collect in Hell
